Choose one of the following: STAT218 or ECON222.

STAT218 and ECON222 are each required and cannot be repeated for credit.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, C1, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, Lower-Division E, F, and GE Elective. Upper-Division C and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). NOTE: GE Area B2 is included in concentrations. Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).
